alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Davidson; Marshall; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:50AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Davidson, northeastern Marshall, Rutherford, eastern Williamson, Wilson, northwestern Bedford and northern Cannon Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 249 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lebanon to near Bellevue. Movement was south at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Lebanon, Woodbury, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Belle Meade, Thompson`s Station, Watertown, Hermitage, Walterhill, Rural Hill, Bellevue, Antioch and Belinda City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 196 and 199, and between mile markers 209 and 248. Interstate 65 between mile markers 55 and 82. Interstate 24 between mile markers 49 and 92. Interstate 840 between mile markers 29 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Davidson; Marshall; Rutherford; Williamson; Wilson
